com.appfirst.statsd
Interface StatsdClient

All Known Subinterfaces:
StatsdService
All Known Implementing Classes:
AFService, DefaultService
public interface StatsdClient

Interface for Java Statsd Client

Author:
Yangming Huang, Mike Okner (michael@appfirst.com)

Method Summary
 boolean decrement(String... buckets)
          This is a convenient method to decrement all the mentioned buckets by 1

          Send gauge metrics with arbitrary value.

Method Detail

gauge

boolean gauge(String bucket,
              int value)
Send gauge metrics with arbitrary value.

Parameters:
bucket - - The bucket name of the metrics.
value - - the reading of the gauge
Returns:
True if success, False if fail to send stats

timing

boolean timing(String bucket,
               int value)
Send timer metrics with arbitrary value.

Parameters:
bucket - - The bucket name of the metrics.
value - - the duration of the timer.
Returns:
True if success, False if fail to send stats.

decrement

boolean decrement(String... buckets)
This is a convenient method to decrement all the mentioned buckets by 1

Parameters:
buckets - - The bucket name of the counter. You can send to more than one counter buckets with the same magnitude.
Returns:
True if success, False if fail to send stats.

increment

boolean increment(String... buckets)
This is a convenient method to increment all the mentioned buckets by 1

Parameters:
buckets - - The bucket name of the counter. You can send to more than one counter buckets with the same magnitude.
Returns:
True if success, False if fail to send stats.

updateStats

boolean updateStats(int value,
                    String... buckets)
Send counter metrics with arbitrary magnitude.

Parameters:
value - - the updating value of the counter.
buckets - - The bucket name of the counter. You can send to more than one counter buckets with the same magnitude.
Returns:
True if success, False if fail to send stats.

updateStats

boolean updateStats(int value,
                    double sampleRate,
                    String... buckets)
Send counter metrics with arbitrary magnitude. This one supports sampling.

Parameters:
value - - the updating value of the counter.
sampleRate - - Rate of sampling. Note this is a counter only feature.
buckets - - The bucket name of the counter. You can send to more than one counter buckets with the same magnitude.
Returns:
True if success, False if fail to send stats.
